CIV–ARC–[CIVILIZATION]–LEDGER — v1.0
Civilizational Memory Codex · Source Registry & Citation Ledger
Consolidated Bibliography with Citation Frequency

Status: ACTIVE · CANONICAL · DERIVED
Governance: CIV–ARC–TEMPLATE v2.7 · CIV–MEM–TEMPLATE v2.7
Scope: Aggregated source registry for [CIVILIZATION] corpus
Last Generated: [DATE]

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
I. PURPOSE & FUNCTION
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
This ledger consolidates all sources cited across MEM–[CIV] files,
providing:

1. SOURCE WEIGHT ANALYSIS
   Which authors anchor the corpus and with what frequency.

2. ARC-T COMPLIANCE AUDIT
   Confirms sources align with approved author lists.

3. DISCOVERY FLAG TRACKING
   Aggregates all ARC–DISCOVERY expansions for review.

4. GAP DETECTION
   Exposes under-represented temporal periods or source types.

5. CROSS-REFERENCE INDEX
   Maps sources to citing MEM files for traceability.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
III. ENTRY FORMAT
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Each source entry follows this structure:

[AUTHOR SURNAME], [FIRST NAME]
  *[Title]* ([Publisher], [Year])
  ARC-T: [ARC-T-CATEGORY]
  Citations: [COUNT]
  MEMs: [LIST OF CITING MEM FILES]

SORTING ORDER:
1. By citation count (descending)
2. Within same count, alphabetically by author surname

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
X. GOVERNANCE & MAINTENANCE
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
DERIVATION RULE:
This ledger is DERIVED from MEM bibliography sections.
It should be regenerated when:
• New MEM files are created
• Existing MEM bibliographies are updated
• Periodic corpus audits (recommended: quarterly)

AUTHORITY:
This ledger is DESCRIPTIVE, not PRESCRIPTIVE.
It reports what IS cited, not what SHOULD BE cited.
ARC–TEMPLATE v2.7 remains the authority for admissibility.

CONFLICT RESOLUTION:
If ledger conflicts with MEM bibliography:
• MEM bibliography is authoritative
• Ledger should be regenerated

VERSION CONTROL:
• Regeneration increments minor version (v1.0 → v1.1)
• Structural changes increment major version (v1.x → v2.0)

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
